reg_info.act_under: Public Accountancy Act   Loi sur la comptabilité publique

content.content:
1. The following fees are payable for the grant or renewal of a licence:  1.

Fee for new licence  

$105


2.

Fee for renewal of licence  

125


3.

Fee for renewal of licence, if paid on or before April 30 in the fiscal year before the fiscal year to which renewal relates  

105 O. Reg. 325/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following fees are payable for the grant or renewal of a licence:

1.

Fee for new licence

$105

2.

Fee for renewal of licence

125

3.

Fee for renewal of licence, if paid on or before April 30 in the fiscal year before the fiscal year to which renewal relates

105

O. Reg. 325/00, s. 1.
